text: DXAS (104.7 FM) Radyo Pilipinas is a radio station owned and operated by Philippine Broadcasting Service. The station's studio is located in Brgy. Bongao Poblacion, Bongao, Tawi-Tawi.Broadcaster killed in Tawi-TawiTawi-Tawi to stand up vs povertySun.Star: Tawi-Tawi mayor 'clears' suspect in Sumalpong slay ==References== Category:Philippine Broadcasting Service Category:Radio stations in Tawi-Tawi Category:Radio stations established in 2016
